name: banker-venezuela
description: 🏦 Sistema modular y escalable para scraping de datos bancarios venezolanos. Arquitectura enterprise-ready con soporte para múltiples bancos, browser persistente y performance optimizada (60% más rápido).

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.browser:status: tsx -e "import { BrowserManager } from './src/shared/utils/browser'; const bm = new BrowserManager(); console.log('Browser status:', await bm.isRunning()); process.exit(0);"
scripts.browser:close: tsx -e "import { BrowserManager } from './src/shared/utils/browser'; const bm = new BrowserManager(); await bm.forceClose(); console.log('Browser closed'); process.exit(0);"
scripts.daemon:status: pgrep -f 'tsx.*browser-daemon' && echo 'Daemon is running' || echo 'Daemon is not running'
scripts.persistent:status: tsx -e "import { PersistentBrowserServer } from './src/shared/utils/browser-server'; const server = PersistentBrowserServer.getInstance(); console.log('Status:', server.getStatus()); process.exit(0);"
scripts.persistent:close: tsx -e "import { PersistentBrowserServer } from './src/shared/utils/browser-server'; const server = PersistentBrowserServer.getInstance(); await server.close(); console.log('Persistent browser closed'); process.exit(0);"
